relatedNodes.html: Every piece of denim we produce is meticulously handcrafted with love and care.
Revice is a direct-to-consumer brand, enabling us to pass on savings by eliminating the middleman.
Unlike fast-fashion, our jeans are crafted from premium denim, built to last.

html > body > main:nth-child(13) > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > text-with-icons-carousel:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h6
